The future is meaningless, but ________ is now.
Modern technology has finally made ________ possible, but it comes with the unfortunate tradeoff of ________.
What's been making waves in the conspiracy community?

_________.
Damned if you do, damned if you don't.
I don't care what anyone else thinks... anybody who is ________ deserves ________!
I was a difficult child; I absolutely wouldn't fall asleep without ________.
content.de-DE: Ich war ein schwieriges Kind; ich würde ohne _________ absolut nicht einschlafen.

content.en-US:
Every night, I pray for ________.
And every morning, I'm sorely disappointed.
Officer, come quick! I just saw someone ________ and then run off!
What's the real reason aliens haven't contacted us?
Wow, that smells good! What are you cooking?
content.de-DE: Das riecht aber gut! Was kochst du da?

content.en-US: Nobody ever thought they'd see me ______. Well, today's the day I make it happen!

content.en-US: Why was I permanently banned from Walmart?

content.en-US: The FBI is investigating after the White House received a suspicious package addressed to the President that contained _______.

content.en-US: To meet new Department of Education requirements, US high schools now require freshmen to take a course on _______.
